body:
Comment 6: 
Yes, but I explicitly disabled it for this test.

However, because of your message, on a hunch I downloaded EICAR and it was still swiftly
removed from my eyes even though the AV was supposed to be disabled according to its UI
and the annoying Windows popup...

I'm very sorry for wasting your time with this.
I'm off to file a bug report with Trend Micro...
